name: CyberTactic
description:
Cybertactic is the adaptation of a digital board game.

The game takes the fight system of the famous fire emblem games in a cyberpunk universe.

Take control of four heroes fighting for their conviction.

> Prototype

Controls:

Left Click: Select/Move

Right Click: Open Player Menu

Escape: Quit

R: Reload the game
